library(dplyr)
library(highcharter)

library(purrr)

source("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/TMBish/site_posts/master/00_utilities/film-review-utils.R")

# Load Edition YAML
yaml = yaml.load_file("yaml/edition-18.yaml")

# Edition
ed = yaml$edition

# Compile chunks
r <- yaml %>%
  pluck("films") %>%
  map(compile_review, edition = ed)
